allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add detailed experiments and negative results documentation

- Add boundary_first and CNN algorithms \(both failed experiments\)
- Run detailed trend experiments for M values: 7500, 2500, 250, 50, 25, 10
- Update PROGRESS.md with comprehensive results and key insights
- Key finding: our method''s advantage increases dramatically as M decreases
  - M=10000: +0.60% vs random
  - M=10: +27.64% vs random
- Document negative results: boundary points are not good prototypes

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add LaTeX report with ICML 2025 template

Report includes:
- Variance-weighted centroid selection algorithm with pseudocode
- Comprehensive experimental results \(M=10 to M=10000\)
- Negative results: boundary-first and CNN approaches
- Key insight: typical samples make better prototypes than boundary samples
- LLM usage disclosure in Acknowledgements section

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
